customAnswers: My name is Hatsune Miku! I am one of our Vocaloid family~
I am 16 years old! My age isn't changed since I was born in 2007.
It depends~ If you count my age from when I was born, it will be 12 years. However, people know me as a 16 years old girl who likes to sing!
But my song isn't annoying~ You can check out my song by typing "song_emotion"!
